meeting_request.purpose: Help deciding between graduate school and working in the Middle East
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m Jason, a second-year majoring in Middle East Languages and Literature. I’ve really enjoyed my major and have been doing well academically. However, I’m still not sure if graduate school is the right path for me or if I should consider working in the Middle East after graduation. I’m interested in exploring my options and talking with someone about what opportunities are available. I’m interested in graduate school, but I’m also interested in working in the Middle East after graduation, and I’m not sure if that would be a good fit. I’m also interested in exploring other career paths that involve working with the Middle East or studying the region, but I’m not sure where to start.
